titles.title: A bill to authorize a demonstration project for the restoration of the Des Plaines River Wetlands.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 3/4/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army, acting through the Chief of Engineers, to carry out a demonstration project for the restoration of the Des Plaines River wetlands in Wadsworth, Illinois. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1989 through 1993 to carry out this Act.
